sources.name: UN World Population Prospects (2015)
sources.description:
Data published by United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2015). World Population Prospects: The 2015 Revision, custom data acquired via website.
Data publisher's source Various, including censuses, vital registrations and maternity histories. Full source information can be found here: https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/DataSources/
Link https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/DataQuery/
Retrieved 2017-02-10

Additional information:

– The original data is presented in deaths per 1,000 live births. Here it is changed to percentages by dividing the original estimates by 100.

– Importantly data refer to 5 year intervals preceding the indicated year. E.g. 1955 refers to 1950-1955 in the original dataset.
